bill.summary:
Trust in Government Act of 2022
This bill directs certain agencies (e.g., the Department of State, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and the Social Security Administration) to take specified steps to improve service delivery and public perception of agency interactions.
The Office of Management and Budget must designate a team of individuals to lead and support agency initiatives to improve public perception of agency interactions.
